quest.name: Call from the Clouds
journal: Fufucha is beaming at your visit.

No sooner do you begin conversing with Fufucha than you are interrupted by one Mujih Mewrilah, a reporter from The Raven. Apparently, Mujih is planning a series of articles, for which she seeks the guild's permission to follow the doings of a first-rate botanist. With none of your peers available who fit the bill, Fufucha recommends you as the subject for Mujih's story. At the same time, she bids you answer a call for aid from faraway Ishgard, which comes through your friend and colleague Roiteloin. Take the letter of introduction Fufucha has given you, and deliver it to Roiteloin at Skyfire Locks.

Roiteloin assures you that a letter of introduction is unnecessary to vouch for your ability, and goes on to share with you the particulars of the call for aid. The petitioner is a botanist named Basyle, who is stationed at Camp Cloudtop in the Sea of Clouds. Roiteloin will arrange for you to meet him at the aetheryte plaza in Foundation; make your way there and join Mujih Mewrilah ahead of time.

You speak with Basyle, who informs you of his work at Camp Cloudtop. He labors to alleviate the outpost's reliance on supplies being shipped in, but his attempts to raise crops thus far have met with little success. It is his hope that your abundant knowledge and skilled hands will serve to aid his cause. Before taking his leave, Basyle promises to send requests to you by way of Mujih.

※The next botanist quest will be available from Mujih Mewrilah upon reaching level 53.
objectives: Deliver Fufucha's letter to Roiteloin at Skyfire Locks.
Speak with Mujih Mewrilah in Ishgard.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: Good eveningmorrowday to you, Forename. It does my spirit well to see you again. Inspired by your words, I have been reflecting upon the relationship between man and forest. I should like to hear your opinion on─

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: (-???-)Fufucha, I'm baaack! Have you given any thought to my request?

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: (-Animated Maiden-)Oh, I beg your pardon! I didn't know you had a guest! Judging by your attire, I take it you're a botanist as well?

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: I am sorry, but our situation is unchanged. I am afraid there are no botanists at present who can assist with your story.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: (-Animated Maiden-)I won't make a burden of myself, I promise! I just need them to answer a few questions in their spare time. What about this adventurer here? SheHe looks like a capable sort.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: Forename? Well, shehe is certainly one of our best. Hmmm...

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: But first things first. Allow me to introduce you to Mujih Mewrilah, a reporter for The Raven. She is planning a series of articles, for which she requests our guild's cooperation.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: Specifically, she would like to follow the doings of a first-rate botanist for an indefinite period of time. Alas, none among us who meets her stringent requirements can afford to engage her at present─none save for perhaps you, Forename...

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: Ooh! My salvation is come, and herhis name is Forename! What exciting adventures into botany will shehe take me on, I wonder...

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: As to that, we have received a petition for aid from faraway Ishgard.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: You will recall our dear friend and colleague Roiteloin, who resides in the central highlands of Coerthas. Well, a friend of his is struggling to raise crops in the Ishgardian frontier, and he begs us send a botanist to aid him.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: The Ishgardian frontier? That sounds positively wild! I can already picture the title: “Foreign Botanist at the Forefrontier”!

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: Heh, I've got a good feeling about this! I'll go on ahead to Roiteloin's place, and ask him a few questions!

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: ...She certainly wastes no time. Assuming you are willing to take on this task and bear with Mujih, please pay Roiteloin a visit yourself and have the particulars from him. I have no doubt that you will gain much from the experience.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: For good measure, here is a letter of introduction. And in case you have forgotten, Roiteloin can be found at Skyfire Locks. Good luck to you, Forename.

dialogue.name: FUFUCHA
dialogue.text: In case you have forgotten, Roiteloin can be found at Skyfire Locks. Show him the letter of introduction when you arrive.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: What kept you? I've long finished interviewing Roiteloin.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: I have been expecting you, Forename. Aye, Mistress Mujih has told me everything, and rather more besides.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: A letter of introduction? Ever proper is our Fufucha. She scarcely needs one of these to vouch for your skill, my friend.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: As you will have been informed, the petition comes not from me, but a friend. Basyle is his name, and he is a botanist engaged in settling the Sea of Clouds. That is where your task will take you, and for an extended period of time.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: Some years ago, House Haillenarte established an outpost there, and they seek to make the place self-sufficient. To this end, my friend has been attempting to cultivate various crops. Alas, results have been mixed at best. And that is where you come into the picture.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: Now, I should like to send you along to Basyle at once, except Ishgard isn't accommodating of foreigners. We must find a way to circumvent the bureaucracy.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: Hm, you have some skill at arms, have you not? Then you should be able to enter our nation in the capacity of a mercenary. However, I have doubts whether Mistress Mujih will be permitted to accompany you...

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: You are a guest of House Fortemps, you say? Well then, your entry was not an issue from the first. However, I have doubts whether Mistress Mujih will be permitted to accompany you...

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: You needn't worry! I have ways of getting into places, and I will get into Ishgard. See if I don't!

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: That is well...I think.

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: Now then, Basyle has returned to the Holy See to meet with you. If it suits, I shall let him know to look for you at the aetheryte plaza.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: At the aetheryte plaza─got it! I'll see you there, Forename!

dialogue.name: ROITELOIN
dialogue.text: Basyle has returned to the Holy See to meet with you. I shall let him know to look for you at the aetheryte plaza.

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be the botanist Roiteloin sent. I must say, your retainer is quite a character.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: What took you so long? Your client's been waiting for the better part of a bell!

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: Curious how I got into Ishgard, I shouldn't doubt? For now, let it suffice to say: if anyone asks, I'm your retainer!

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: 'Tis a pleasure to meet you, Forename, and your lively retainer as well. I'm Basyle. Thank you for making the long journey to Ishgard. Though we still have some ways to go, to be sure.

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: As I'm sure you've been told, I'm a botanist at Camp Cloudtop. We're heavily reliant on supplies being brought in by airship, but I'm trying to change that. Unfortunately, my ventures into farming haven't yielded the results I had hoped for.

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: And so I reached out to Roiteloin, who then reached out to your guild. I'll be turning to your abundant knowledge and skilled hands both.

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: In case you're wondering, I haven't any work for you just yet─today's a meet and greet, as it were. When I've got a specific request, I'll send word by way of your trusty retainer.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: And a trustier retainer there has never been! I shall convey all your messages without delay!

dialogue.name: BASYLE
dialogue.text: I'd be much obliged, miss. Now then, I'd best be getting back to my work. I look forward to seeing you again, most certainly at Camp Cloudtop.

dialogue.name: MUJIHMEWRILAH
dialogue.text: I'll remain here in Ishgard and await word from Basyle. Please come by whenever you can spare a moment from your busy schedule!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next botanist quest will be available from Mujih Mewrilah upon reaching level 53.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The requirements for undertaking subsequent quests can be reviewed in your journal.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your skills as a forager would be put to great use in gathering collectables. Speak with Morgayne at Saint Reinette's Forum in Ishgard to learn more of this lucrative business opportunity.
